subject: Re: [PATCH v4 30/31] mm: memcontrol: eliminate the problem of dying memory cgroup for LRU folios

reviews.author: Qi Zheng (author)
reviews.summary: Reviewer Qi Zheng pointed out the need for refactoring to reparent LRU folios and objcgs together, ensuring consistency in handling dying memory cgroups.

reviews.author: Shakeel Butt
reviews.summary: Shakeel Butt reviewed patch [PATCH v4 30/31] and suggested improvements to the reparenting logic, including acquiring locks individually for each node and removing unnecessary code.

reviews.author: Usama Arif
reviews.summary: The reviewer raised a concern that the patch might break lockdep on more than 4 NUMA nodes due to the acquisition of two locks per node.

reviews.author: Harry Yoo
reviews.summary: Reviewer Harry Yoo pointed out a type mismatch in the nr_pages parameter of mem_cgroup_update_lru_size() and suggested changing it to long.
